products.name: TV1
products.title: Brand 1
products.description: This product was a game changer and took over the market after release. It offers great picture and a beautiful frame for any taste. True-to-life picture quality - Experience breathtaking 4K Ultra HD picture quality with over 8 million pixels for stunning clarity, deep contrast and vivid colors.

products.name: TV2
products.title: Brand 2
products.description: If you are looking for a good big screen TV and don’t want to overspend, this is one to consider. Brand 2 made good quality TV available to a wide range of customers with this design. You can also connect your cable/satellite box or gaming console through one of the TV's three HDMI ports.

products.name: TV3
products.title: Brand 3
products.description: Smart functionality delivers all your favorite content with over 500,000 movies and TV episodes. Brand 3 introduced this product for their high-end customers but the technology magazine described this product as “Overpriced”.

products.name: TV4
products.title: Brand 4
products.description: Brand 4 focuses on the customers who want to feel special. 720p HD resolution for a crisp picture. Stand Separation Distance - 21.3 inch. This TV comes in a limited edition, offers a great picture and there is only a few left in the stock.

products.name: TV5
products.title: Brand 5
products.description: A full high definition display paired with an advanced refresh rate, and dual-band Wifi allows you to capture every moment. Brilliant display, great quality and beautiful design, made this TV to one of the bestsellers of the market in 2019. A must have product for a great price.

products.name: TV6
products.title: Brand 6
products.description: Not only this TV has a great quality, but also as the result of the collaboration between Brand 6 and a famous interior designer, it comes with a unique and special TV stand, with gives it an authentic look in your living room.

products.name: TV7
products.title: Brand 7
products.description: This product did not satisfy the expectation and was considered one of the weaker innovations of Brand 7.  The remote has to be aimed just right at the sensor, meaning most of the time you have to press buttons more than once to get them to work. It was meant to be appealing to people with an eye for art but the picture did not satisfy the buyers.

products.name: TV8
products.title: Brand 8
products.description: #1 bestseller on amazon. This product is backed by a one-year manufacturer's warranty, and includes power cable and quick start guide. Brand 8 took a great portion of mainstream customers in 2018 with this design and to this day, it is considered a great TV for it’s price.

products.name: Table1
products.title: Brand 1

products.name: Table3
products.title: Brand 3

products.name: Table4
products.title: Brand 4
products.description: A new name in home design. Brand 4 has still room to improve when it comes to quality but they have been offering some promising designs. If they keep improving at this pace, they might become a serious name in the business in 10 years.

products.name: Table5
products.title: Brand 5
